item.title: Thursday's big stock stories: Whatâ€™s likely to move the market in the next trading session
item.description: The S&P 500 and the Dow Industrials touched fresh all-time highs in Wednesday's session, but ultimately closed lower on the day.

item.title: Trump says U.S. to ban large investors from buying homes
item.description: "I am immediately taking steps to ban large institutional investors from buying more single-family homes," Trump said.

item.title: Nvidia's Jensen Huang said he loves this company. The shares could nearly double this year, says one analyst
item.description: Analysts have gotten increasingly bullish on this company since announcing it has deployed the largest sidewalk delivery fleet in the U.S.

item.title: Sandisk is already up nearly 50% in 2026. Is it too late to buy?
item.description: After Sandisk's monster rally, the question is whether there's more room to run.

item.title: Buy this lithium stock that's set for a major rally this year after a strong 2025, says Baird
item.description: Baird's new $210 price target implies a potential upside of 33% ahead for Albemarle.
